Applicant : Lopez, Linda
School (district) : White Pine Elementary (Cassia County School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : I fish, hike, camp, I can food from my garden and trees.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am both a teacher and the after-school program SPARK coordinator for kids K-6. I would love to enrich students in both areas, gaining valuable knowledge to expand not just them, but my abilities as well. This program could help to bring STEM skills to kids who may not be exposed to them as early as I would be able to provide. I also do not have a lot of knowledge of what or how to provide this on my own.

This program could help to bring STEM skills to kids who may not be exposed to them as early as I would be able to provide. I also do not have a lot of knowledge of what or how to provide this on my own.
